name: Mamegoma 3: Kawaii ga Ippai!
storyline:
In Mamegoma 3, you can grow small and cute "Mamegoma" while feeding them and playing with them.
The feature of this latest work in the series is that you can raise up to 8 Mamegoma at the same time. In a breeding place called "Clover Square", Mamegoma and others move and roll as they please. They are very happy when the player strokes and rolls them.

Occasionally, a mysterious bird called "Ojamamedori" comes to Clover Square. This is a disturbing character drawn by Mayumi Yonemura, the original author of this work, and drops something called "Funchama" in the square. If Mamegoma touches this, it will stop growing, so you have to be careful.

In addition, this work also includes collection elements such as raising all 50 types of Mamegoma to complete the "Mamegoma Encyclopedia" and a vegetable garden where you can grow vegetables and fruits that Mamegoma will eat. there is
summary: This time, a total of 50 types of Mamegoma, including 10 new ones, will appear, and you can raise up to 8 Mamegoma at the same time in the spacious "Clover Square". When the player gives a signal, the Mamegoma will gather and show cute reactions such as eating, singing, and playing. In addition, Ojamamedori & Funchama, original game characters drawn by the original author, Mayumi Yonemura, will appear for the first time. If Mamegoma accidentally touches it, it will either laugh or cry and stop growing. There are 18 types of crops that can be grown, including green soybeans, sweet potatoes, strawberries, and bananas. If you take good care of it and harvest it every day, Mamegoma will happily eat it.
